data.title: Management Plan For The Natural & Cultural Heritage of The OHRID REGION
data.meta_description:
Management plan for the natural & cultural heritage  of the OHRID REGION - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. 1. The document provides a management plan for the natural and cultural heritage of the Ohrid region in Macedonia, which was designated a UNESCO World Heritage site due to its outstanding universal values. 

2. The management plan establishes a vision to maintain the region's universal value for future generations while supporting its authenticity. It aims to balance development with preserving the unique natural and cultural values through sustainable spatial planning and cultural promotion.

3. Key objectives include increasing regional self-preservation capacities, revitalizing the area's economy and cultural life through restoration and new compatible programs, and establishing sustainable tourism that benefits local communities.
data.text: Management Plan For The Natural & Cultural Heritage of The OHRID REGION
